attributes.action: Force people over the age of 60 to take a refresher driving test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People over 60 in more cases than none have had there licence for over 30 years driving standards have improved and they cause more accidents by going to slow and have no courtesy for other drivers. if they were to take a refresher course they would realise there slow driving aggrivates drivers and causes them to over take and drive iratically implecating risks of accidents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
